job.jobname: 05.1.1 - ESE - Update CRM type in Synergy

step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SYNERGY_RELATIONTYPES_LOG]
SELECT [cmp_wwn] ,[Code] ,[Relatienaam] ,[Debiteurcode] ,[Status] ,[TypeCode] ,[TypeDescription] ,[NewTypeCode] ,[NewTypeDescription] ,[ClassificationId] ,[maxorddat] ,[MaxContactDat] ,[MaxQuotDat] ,GETDATE() as updated ,'%runid%' as runid FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_SYNERGY_RELATIONTYPES] WHERE typecode collate database_default <> newtypecode
SELECT top 100 percent cmp_wwn, NewTypeCode as cmp_type from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_SYNERGY_RELATIONTYPES_LOG] where runid = '%runid%'

select c.cmp_wwn, 'B' as cmp_status,
CONCAT(ISNULL(c.cmp_note, '') collate database_default, CONVERT(text,(' [ABEI Synchronisation ' + CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120) + '] Blocked because debtor has been downgraded.' ))) as cmp_note
from [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..cicmpy cc with (NOLOCK) on c.cmp_code = cc.cmp_code where c.cmp_type = 'C' and cc.cmp_type <> 'C' and c.cmp_status = 'A'
step.stepname: Block accounts in Globe with different type

step.datasource:

CONCAT(ISNULL(c.cmp_note, '') collate database_default, CONVERT(text,(' [ABEI Synchronisation ' + CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120) + '] Blocked because debtor has been downgraded.' ))) as cmp_note
from [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..cicmpy cc with (NOLOCK) on c.cmp_code = cc.cmp_code where c.cmp_type = 'C' and cc.cmp_type <> 'C' and c.cmp_status = 'A'
